definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms
(archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude

sentences.english: The first group of affordable public housing tenants in Shenyang moved into their new homes yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 沈阳市保障性住房第一批住户昨天喜迁新居。

sentences.english: But have you ever heard that the students had holiday because the schoolmaster moved to new house?
sentences.chinese: 但是你听说过因为校长乔迁新居所以学生放假吗？

sentences.english: In his new home I noticed a sewing-machine and a radio.
sentences.chinese: 在他的新居中，我看到一架缝纫机和一台收音机。

sentences.english: The newly married couple moved into their new home.
sentences.chinese: 这对新婚夫妇迁入新居。

sentences.english: The day we moved in, Steve was there to greet us.
sentences.chinese: 我们喜迁新居的那天，斯蒂夫就在那儿欢迎我们了。

sentences.english: Blockbuster and allow son puts forward cooperation design the new residence of meihua, ChengKang agree.
sentences.chinese: 一鸣与允儿提出合作设计美华的新居，承康同意。

sentences.english: Recently I had a friend, in his new home's rear court has built the tool house .
sentences.chinese: 最近我有个朋友，在他新居的后院搭了间工具房。

sentences.english: Show studio will sell to love China, yao Ming that help show your find new homes.
sentences.chinese: 秀卿将画室卖予爱华，耀明即帮秀卿找到新居。

sentences.english: Zhabei District Yangpu District and to reform the family first got the new house keys.
sentences.chinese: 杨浦区和闸北区首批接受改造的家庭拿到了新居钥匙。

sentences.english: We have a comfortable new residence.
sentences.chinese: 我们有了一个舒适的新居。

sentences.english: In modern times Chinese people set off fireworks on celebrations such as a wedding or moving to a new home.
sentences.chinese: 现代人在喜庆时也放烟花，如婚礼和乔迁新居。

sentences.english: I have to readdress the letter to their new home.
sentences.chinese: 我必须把信封上的地址改写成他们新居的地址。

sentences.english: I hope your new dewelling will bring you and your family loads offortune and good health.
sentences.chinese: 谨祝你的新居将为你全家带来鸿运。

sentences.english: An old friend goes to visit her college roommate in her new house.
sentences.chinese: 一个老朋友去她的大学同宿舍好友的新居拜访。

sentences.english: The modern paint adds luster to the walls of your new home.
sentences.chinese: 新型涂料，令您新居四壁增辉。

sentences.english: About the time the family moved into their new home. Twain’s health improved dramatically.
sentences.chinese: 也就在全家乔迁新居时，吐温的身体戏剧般地好转了。

definition: Xinwu or Hsinwu township in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan
congratulations on house-moving or promotion (idiom); Best wishes for your new home!
a building of two or more stories/CL:棟|栋[dong4],幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)
Anju district of Suining city 遂寧市|遂宁市[Sui4 ning2 shi4], Sichuan
Pingfang district of Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1] in Heilongjiang
to demolish a building and relocate the inhabitants
